pr_title: Clean up mod resolution error messages

timeline.message: start whacking at the confusing error messages in loader

timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Oh yeah, that might be helpful. I'm not sure what form it'd appear in, so we'll have to see.
replies.author: LemmaEOF

replies.bodyText: I dont think this is much better than the real error, fixing the issue will be best
replies.author: modmuss50

replies.bodyText: Hmm, I just want you to print more info on the unsatisfied problem either in log or in exception message..
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: I have not been able to confirm that problems have a satisfactory toString implementation.
replies.author: LemmaEOF

replies.bodyText: Sure, it you don't print the problem guess we can attach a debugger at this throw breakpoint and just look up the problem from the debugger.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: any example of crash of zip error before?
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: here's one, as well as in #185
replies.author: LemmaEOF

replies.bodyText: Yes, this is a good idea.
replies.author: modmuss50

replies.bodyText: No option to make this into a multi-cache and treat both the same?
replies.author: Sollace

replies.bodyText: It could be a multi-catch, but I feel like having different messages for different errors is better.
replies.author: LemmaEOF
